action.action-desc: Mr. Mrvan introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to make certain improvements in the laws relating to the appointment of the Under Secretary of Health and Assistant Under Secretaries of Health of the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Veterans Health Administration Leadership Transformation Act.

section.header: Under Secretary of Health of Department of Veterans Affairs

subsection.text: Section 305(a)(1) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following new sentence: An individual appointed to serve as the Under Secretary of Health shall be appointed for a term of five years..

subsection.header: Number of Assistant Under Secretaries of Health
subsection.text: Subsection (a)(3) of section 7306 of such title is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking Not to exceed eight and inserting As many; and
by inserting as the Secretary determines necessary after Health.

subsection.header: Elimination of certain requirements for Assistant Under Secretaries

paragraph.text: by redesignating subsections (c) through (g) as subsections (b) through (f), respectively; and
in subsection (c), as so redesignated, by striking subsection (e) and inserting subsection (d).
